column1: According  to  both  PW1  and  PW2  the  Appellant  had  once  abandoned  the

column2: in  the  night.  According  to  the  witnesses  the

column1: Appellant had dragged the deceased to a forest area  around 10.00 p.m. in
the night and abandoned her. This incident had happened on 17/04/2010
as the PW1 had received a call from the deceased that night. The deceased
had managed to come to a bicycle garage and called PW1.
